publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Job 17
ab.l: Ǯanym čejpaldy ḱuńĺarim kesiĺdiĺar zeŕat́ĺar t́oźdirĺar ḿeni.
Kertid́ań joḥtur aldamaḥlar qatymda vale ačyrɣandyrmaḥlaryndan ket́ti juqusu ḱoźĺarimniń.
Qojɣun eńdi qoš- ḥun ḿeni qatyjda kim ol qoluma uvuč qaɣar.
Ki juŕakĺariń qaplejdyr anlamaḥtan anyn üč́uń ḱot́urḿagiń.
Jylmalyḥny anlatuv- ču dostlaryna da ḱoźĺari ulanlarynyn t́e ĺḿarsińĺar .

Da turɣuzdu
ḿeni čejnavyna uluslarnyn vale aɣalyḥ burundan edim.
Da tundu ačuvdan ḱoźum da kirpikĺarim ḱoĺaǵa kibik aštylar.
Tamaša et́arĺar t́uźĺar bunun üč́uń da ḱońu kiši juź et́uv́č́́u üśt́uńa ojanyr.
Da tutar rast kiši jolun da aruv qollu arttyryr kipĺańḿa.
Da kertid́ań barlaryjyz qajtyjyz da kelijiź eńdi ki tapmadym siźd́a uslu kiši.
Ḱuńĺarim ašty- lar saɣyšlarym čejpaldylar üźuĺd́uĺar fikirĺari juŕagimniń.
Keč́ani ḱuńǵa qojadyrlar jaryḥ juvuḥraḥtyr alnyndan qaranɣynyn.
Eǵer biĺgi- ĺaśam ǵord́a üv́umńu qaranɣyda t́oš́aśam t́oš́akĺarimni.
Da qajda bu orunda bolur išančym da umsunčumnu kim ḱoźĺajalir any.
Ǵorǵa čaɣyrsam atamdyr śeń anam da siĺlim qurtḥa.
Qaranɣy jerĺarińa ǵorńuń eńarĺar ki birǵa topraḥ üśt́uńa turarbiz.

app.note: F305.90: t́erḿarsińĺar; probably a scribal error.
Job 17:14 and Job 17:15 were copied in a wrong order, but the mistake was indicated by the copyist.
F305.90: śoźĺajalir; a scribal error. | JSul.I.04: közlejelir.
